deck.question: 还
deck.meaning: still; yet; in addition; even | repay; to return

deck.meaning: to pass; to cross; go over; (indicates a past experience)

deck.meaning: ah; (particle showing elation, doubt, puzzled surprise, or approval)

deck.meaning: by (indicates passive voice sentences); a quilt/blanket

deck.meaning: a floor of a building [counter word]
